title: i need with with changing email :U
body: I can't change email on my main account because i can't open the current email anymore, so is there any other way to change email?

replies.body: We'd like to help you out!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can get you fixed up.  I recommend reviewing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation for any questions you may be asked for verification.  You'll be in good hands!
